topic.title: Delete Empty Elements
topic.shortdesc: Deletes empty elements of the specified type in the current file or book.

body.p: elementsdeleting emptyThis command prompts for an element name to delete. While processing, it scans all elements of the specified name and checks for content. If the element contains nothing or only whitespace, it is deleted. If multiple element names need to be processed, enter multiple element names separated by spaces.
You can pre-set these values in the DeleteEmpty parameter in the fm2dita.ini file. Refer to the information in for details on this INI parameter.
This command should be run after the EDD has been applied.
